title: The Noble Consort’s Pet Empress - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Historical   Martial Arts   Romance   Yuri
tags: Adopted Children   Ancient China   Assassins   Beautiful Female Lead   Bisexual Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Cohabitation   Confident Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Hiding True Identity   Imperial Harem   Loyal Subordinates   Overpowered Protagonist   Pets   Power Couple   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Royalty   Shameless Protagonist   Transmigration
author: 江南魂姑娘
description:
Shen Yuqing and the Emperor had a secret arrangement—

She was his pampered consort, and she would hit wherever the Emperor directed her to strike;

The Emperor “loved and favored her forever”, and she could do whatever she wanted.

Later, she set her eyes on the Empress who had the same type of marriage only in name…>
